names.english: cinnamon and poria sweet dew drink
names.commonEnglish: Cinnamon and Poria Sweet Dew Drink
aka: Cinnamon and Poria Sweet Dew Decoction

actions: Promotes urination, drains Heat from the Urinary Bladder, expels Damp-Heat, releases Summeheat and resolves Dampness.
With Gan Cao, for Summerheat causing painful urinary dysfunction, thirst, irritability, and fever.
Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, clears Heat and moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs.
Clears Heat in the Qi Stage, drains Fire, relieves irritability and quenches thirst.
Clears Heat, drains Fire from the Yang Ming/Qi Level and expels Summerheat.
With Shi Gao, for Excess Qi Level Heat.
With Shi Gao and Huan Shi, for Heat in the Yang-Ming/Qi level and Summerheat with high fever, thirst and irritability.
Leads the Fire back to its source.
Promotes urination, leaches out Dampness and dispels Damp-Heat.
With Zhu Ling, drains Damp, unblocks and drains urinary pathways and drains Heat from the Bladder.
Promotes urination and leaches out Dampness.

With Ze Xie, facilitates the removal of water and leaches out Dampness to treat stagnant water and Dampness leading to edema, jaundice, diarrhea, Milky Lin, and scanty, difficult urination with abdominal distention.
With Ze Xie and Zhu Ling, for dysuria.
With Bai Zhu, strengthens the Spleen and resolves Dampness.
With Zhu Ling, promotes urination.
Promotes urination and leaches out Dampness.
With Bai Zhu, for Spleen Deficiency leading to accumulation of Dampness with urinary difficulty, loose stools, diarrhea, Milky Lin or vaginal discharge.
Dries Dampness and promotes water metabolism.
With Zhu Ling and Ze Xie, for edema due to Internal Dampness.
With Fu Ling and Gan Cao, for Spleen and Stomach Qi Deficiency.
With Fu Ling, Zhu Ling and Ze Xie, for edema with Spleen Deficiency.
Expels Summerheat
Clears Heat
Regulates Qi
Resolves Dampness
syndromes: Summerheat with Internal Stagnation of water and Dampness

symptoms: Abdominal fullness, pain or stifling sensation
All symptoms and signs occur during the summer

contraindications: This formula treats Summerheat and Dampness with overwhelming Heat and Dampness or Heat more pronounced than Dampness. It is contraindicated for those with Dampness more pronounced than Heat.

notes: This formula is used to treat vomiting, diarrhea and fright Wind in children during the summer.

modifications.purpose: watery diarrhea, spontaneous sweat, reddish urine and a soft, rapid pulse
